img.title: Principal lunch with student council at Carr Elementary
Fulton City Lady Bulldogs' LeAndra Randle attempts to throw out a hitter at first base during a recent softball game. Randle plays shortstop for the team.
If you look closely you might see some softball action in Jacob Madding's sunglasses. The seventh grader was at the Fulton City Park supporting the Lady Bulldogs softball team.
Carr Elementary School participates in the first fire drill of the school year
It's not even lunch time and Beda is already worn out!
